experiments.title: Add concise 'What to expect' trust block under top CTA
experiments.hypothesis: Expectation-setting content improves progression into contact flow.
experiments.rollbackCondition: Engagement time drops >10% with no conversion gain

experiments.title: Standardize campaign UTM fields and retire unstructured outbound links
experiments.hypothesis: Consistent attribution increases decision quality and channel optimization speed.
experiments.rollbackCondition: Coverage remains <80% after one release cycle

experiments.title: Clarify primary CTA label and placement on top service pages
experiments.hypothesis: CTA clarity will increase progression from services to contact intent.
experiments.rollbackCondition: No uplift after 14 days or conversion drop >3%

experiments.title: Simplify contact-start field sequence to reduce friction
experiments.hypothesis: Fewer required fields at initial submit increases completion rate.
experiments.rollbackCondition: Completion rate decreases or junk submissions increase >15%

experiments.title: Add mobile trust panel above fold with contact options
experiments.hypothesis: Mobile trust cues will reduce early abandonment on high-intent pages.
experiments.rollbackCondition: No improvement in mobile form-start rate after 14 days

experiments.title: Align low-intent high-volume channel landing pages to stronger intent match
experiments.hypothesis: Landing alignment for low-intent channels increases conversion quality.
experiments.successMetric: channel conversion rate +15% for target source/medium

experiments.title: Refresh FAQ snippets for highest-traffic inquiry pages
experiments.hypothesis: FAQ specificity lowers hesitation for contact starts.
experiments.successMetric: contact intent events +6% on FAQ and support pages
